name: multi-proc
description: Simple package to allow running multiple node packages at the same time.
author: Aaron Klinker <aaronklinker1@gmail.com>

scripts.compile: rm -rf lib/* && echo "export default '$(node -p require\(\'./package.json\'\).version)';" > src/version.ts && tsc
scripts.prepublish: yarn build && git commit -am "Updated build directory"
